3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers\rest;

5 use Ubiquity\controllers\Startup;
6 use Ubiquity\cache\ClassUtils;
7 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheManager;
8 use Ubiquity\exceptions\RestException;
9 use Ubiquity\log\Logger;
10 
20 class RestServer {
25  protected $config;
26  protected $headers;
27  protected $tokensFolder;
28  protected $tokensCacheKey = "_apiTokens";
29 
34  protected $apiTokens;
35 
36  public function __construct(&$config) {
37  $this->config = $config;
38  $this->headers = [ 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' => 'http://127.0.0.1:4200','Access-Control-Allow-Credentials' => 'true','Access-Control-Max-Age' => '86400','Access-Control-Allow-Methods' => 'GET, POST, OPTIONS, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, HEAD','Content-type' => 'application/json; charset=utf8' ];
39  }
40 
41  public function connect(RestBaseController $controller) {
42  if (! isset ( $this->apiTokens )) {
43  $this->apiTokens = $this->_getApiTokens ();
44  }
45  $token = $this->apiTokens->addToken ();
46  $this->_addHeaderToken ( $token );
47  echo $controller->_format ( [ "access_token" => $token,"token_type" => "Bearer","expires_in" => $this->apiTokens->getDuration () ] );
48  }
49 
55  public function isValid() {
56  $this->apiTokens = $this->_getApiTokens ();
57  $key = $this->_getHeaderToken ();
58  if ($this->apiTokens->isExpired ( $key )) {
59  return false;
60  } else {
61  $this->_addHeaderToken ( $key );
62  return true;
63  }
64  }
65 
66  public function _getHeaderToken() {
67  $authHeader = $this->_getHeader ( "Authorization" );
68  if ($authHeader !== false) {
69  list ( $type, $data ) = explode ( " ", $authHeader, 2 );
70  if (\strcasecmp ( $type, "Bearer" ) == 0) {
71  return $data;
72  } else {
73  throw new RestException ( "Bearer is required in authorization header." );
74  }
75  } else {
76  throw new RestException ( "The header Authorization is required in http headers." );
77  }
78  }
79 
80  public function finalizeTokens() {
81  if (isset ( $this->apiTokens )) {
82  $this->apiTokens->removeExpireds ();
83  $this->apiTokens->storeToCache ();
84  }
85  }
86 
87  public function _getHeader($header) {
88  $headers = getallheaders ();
89  if (isset ( $headers [$header] )) {
90  return $headers [$header];
91  }
92  return false;
93  }
94 
95  public function _addHeaderToken($token) {
96  $this->_header ( "Authorization", "Bearer " . $token );
97  }
98 
104  public function _getApiTokens() {
105  return ApiTokens::getFromCache ( CacheManager::getAbsoluteCacheDirectory () . \DS, $this->tokensCacheKey );
106  }
107 
114  public function _header($headerField, $value = null, $replace = null) {
115  if (! isset ( $value )) {
116  if (isset ( $this->headers [$headerField] )) {
117  $value = $this->headers [$headerField];
118  } else
119  return;
120  }
121  \header ( trim ( $headerField ) . ": " . trim ( $value ), $replace );
122  }
123 
129  public function _setContentType($contentType = null, $charset = null) {
130  $value = $contentType;
131  if (isset ( $charset ))
132  $value .= "; charset=" . $charset;
133  $this->_header ( "Content-type", $value );
134  }
135 
136  public function cors() {
137  $this->_header ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' );
138  $this->_header ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Credentials' );
139  $this->_header ( 'Access-Control-Max-Age' );
140  if ($_SERVER ['REQUEST_METHOD'] == 'OPTIONS') {
141  if (isset ( $_SERVER ['HTTP_ACCESS_CONTROL_REQUEST_METHOD'] ))
142  $this->_header ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods' );
143 
144  if (isset ( $_SERVER ['HTTP_ACCESS_CONTROL_REQUEST_HEADERS'] )) {
145  $this->_header ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers', $_SERVER ['HTTP_ACCESS_CONTROL_REQUEST_HEADERS'] );
146  } else {
147  $this->_header ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers', '*' );
148  }
149  Logger::info ( "Rest", "cors exit normally", "Cors" );
150  }
151  }
152 
153  public static function getRestNamespace() {
154  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
155  $controllerNS = $config ["mvcNS"] ["controllers"];
156  $restNS = "";
157  if (isset ( $config ["mvcNS"] ["rest"] )) {
158  $restNS = $config ["mvcNS"] ["rest"];
159  }
160  return ClassUtils::getNamespaceFromParts ( [ $controllerNS,$restNS ] );
161  }
162 
163  public function setAccessAllowOrigin($address = '*') {
164  $this->headers ['Access-Control-Allow-Origin'] = $address;
165  }
166 }
